full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Night Vision Monocular Devices
===========================================================

### Title and Reference

* **English Title:** Night Vision Monocular Devices
* **French Title:** Dispositifs portables de vision nocturne monoculaire
* **Reference Number:** PW-__QT-021-29145
* **Solicitation Number:** F7013-220304/A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-08-18
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-12T14:00:00

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (G&D)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ontario (except NCR), Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, New Brunswick
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Contracting Entity:** Public Works and Government Services Canada

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of Night Vision Monocular Devices (MNVD) and associated accessories for the Canadian Coast Guard.

* **Scope of Work:** Procurement of MNVD units, maintenance, and support for the Canadian Coast Guard's Search and Rescue (SAR) Team.
* **Quantity and Term:** Initial requirement for 20 units, with a contract duration of 5 years.
* **Price and Payment:** Bidders are required to propose firm lot pricing for the equipment acquisition and hourly rates for maintenance and support.

### Evaluation Criteria

* **Evaluation Method:** Lowest/Lower Bid
* **Compliance with Requirements:** Bidders must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Julian Carbone
* **Contact Email:** julian.carbone@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (613) 447-8326
* **Contact Address:** Place du Portage III, 8C2, 11 rue Laurier Street, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Attachment

* **Notice Document:** [Attachment download URL]

Note: All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. It is recommended that bidders request a
